mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Desmond, Cornelius
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Desmond, Cornelius Patient Age: 40. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left side. Bullet entered at the angle of the ninth rib passing 4 inches inwards slightly downward to exit at the neck of the the 10th rib fracturing the 9th and 10th ribs . Location Wounded: In action at Fisher's Hill, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/22. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
